articles.author: Curtis Crabtree
articles.title: Bill Belichick thanks Tom Brady, calls him “best player in NFL history” - NBC Sports - NFL
articles.description: Tom Brady may not have finished his career with the New England Patriots but he created most of his legacy during his 20 years with the franchise.After announcing his retirement on Tuesday, Patriots head coach Bill Belichick released a statement thanking Brad…
articles.content:
Tom Brady may not have finished his career with the New England Patriots but he created most of his legacy during his 20 years with the franchise.
